requirement_tested: Display real-time solar power generation data
user_persona: A homeowner monitoring their solar energy system.
user_goal: To see the current solar power generation in kW on the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Solar Generation Card
narrative_steps.description: Maria opens the dashboard and looks for her solar system's live performance. She sees the 'Solar Power Generation' card prominently displayed.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the real-time data section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'Solar Power Generation' card is visible with a numerical value indicating current kW output, styled with honeydew background and dark olive green text.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Data Manually
narrative_steps.description: Maria notices the value hasn't updated recently and decides to manually refresh it by clicking the refresh icon next to the title.
narrative_steps.action: Click the refresh icon located on the card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The displayed value updates instantly to reflect the latest reading fetched from the realTimeDataAPI.

user_persona: An environmentally conscious user tracking home electricity usage.
user_goal: To monitor how much power their household is currently consuming.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Consumption Metrics
narrative_steps.description: John logs into the dashboard to check his home’s current power consumption. He locates the 'Power Consumption' card among other real-time metrics.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the real-time data section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'Power Consumption' card displays the current usage in kW, matching the specified honeydew and dark olive green styling.

narrative_steps.title: Manual Refresh of Consumption Value
narrative_steps.description: Curious if there was a change, John clicks the refresh icon to get an updated reading without waiting for auto-refresh.
narrative_steps.action: Click the refresh icon on the 'Power Consumption' card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The consumption value updates immediately based on new data retrieved from the realTimeDataAPI.

user_persona: A homeowner reliant on stored solar energy during off-peak hours.
user_goal: To know how much charge remains in their solar battery storage unit.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Battery Status
narrative_steps.description: Lisa checks her dashboard after returning home to verify that her solar battery has enough charge to cover evening needs.
narrative_steps.action: View the real-time battery percentage card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A progress bar-style card labeled 'Battery Level' visually indicates the current percentage with appropriate styling.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering a Manual Update
narrative_steps.description: Noticing the percentage seems unchanged, Lisa clicks the refresh button to confirm its accuracy.
narrative_steps.action: Click the refresh icon associated with the battery card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The battery level updates dynamically with fresh data pulled from the realTimeDataAPI.

user_persona: A facility manager reviewing monthly energy efficiency reports.
user_goal: To retrieve past solar and consumption data for reporting purposes.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Historical Query Interface
narrative_steps.description: David navigates to the historical data section where he finds a form to specify the date range and filters needed.
narrative_steps.action: Open the historical data query form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A form appears with fields for Start Date, End Date, and filter checkboxes, all styled according to design guidelines.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Historical Data Request
narrative_steps.description: After selecting last month's dates and choosing relevant filters, David submits the request to fetch the data.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out the form and click 'Fetch Historical Data'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system sends the selected parameters to the historicalDataAPI and retrieves matching records for further analysis.

requirement_tested: Show trend analysis for historical solar data
user_persona: An analyst evaluating long-term solar performance patterns.
user_goal: To analyze solar generation trends over several weeks.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Trend Visualization
narrative_steps.description: Sarah selects a wide date range and requests historical data which includes trend visualizations.
narrative_steps.action: Submit a query covering multiple weeks.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Charts appear showing solar generation trends over time, rendered with dark olive green lines against a honeydew background.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Different Trends
narrative_steps.description: She scrolls down to explore additional trend graphs provided below the main chart area.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through the trend visualization section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Different trend representations load smoothly as she scrolls, maintaining consistent visual style.

requirement_tested: Include chart visualization for data analysis
user_persona: A technician diagnosing inconsistencies in solar output.
user_goal: To inspect detailed solar data points using interactive charts.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Chart Data Points
narrative_steps.description: Mike hovers over a spike in the solar generation line graph to understand more about that moment.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a peak data point on the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears displaying the exact timestamp and kW value for that data point.

narrative_steps.title: Toggling Dataset Visibility
narrative_steps.description: To focus better, Mike hides the consumption dataset temporarily by clicking on its label in the chart legend.
narrative_steps.action: Click the legend item for 'Power Consumption'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The consumption line disappears from the chart, leaving only the solar generation curve visible.

user_persona: A UI designer ensuring brand consistency across dashboards.
user_goal: To confirm the entire dashboard uses honeydew (#F0FFF0) as the background.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Dashboard Background Color
narrative_steps.description: Emma inspects the dashboard layout to ensure the overall aesthetic aligns with company branding standards.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the full dashboard visually.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every section of the dashboard—including real-time cards, forms, and charts—uses #F0FFF0 (honeydew) as the base background color.

requirement_tested: Use dark olive green for component styling
user_persona: A frontend developer validating UI implementation.
user_goal: To verify that interactive elements use dark olive green (#556B2F) for styling.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Component Styling
narrative_steps.description: Tom examines various components such as buttons, card titles, and chart axes to confirm correct color usage.
narrative_steps.action: Review key UI components visually.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All borders, texts, and highlight elements on interactive components are styled with #556B2F (dark olive green).

requirement_tested: Organize dashboard into real-time data display section
user_persona: A first-time user exploring the dashboard layout.
user_goal: To quickly locate real-time solar metrics at a glance.

narrative_steps.title: Identifying Real-Time Section Layout
narrative_steps.description: Alex lands on the dashboard and scans the upper portion expecting to find critical real-time information.
narrative_steps.action: Scan the top region of the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Three clearly labeled cards—Solar Power Generation, Power Consumption, Battery Percentage—are arranged horizontally in the top section.

user_persona: A regular user needing periodic access to archived data.
user_goal: To efficiently input criteria and retrieve historical data entries.

narrative_steps.title: Using the Historical Query Form
narrative_steps.description: Raj enters specific start and end dates along with desired filters to extract meaningful historical insights.
narrative_steps.action: Input dates and select filters in the query form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form fields accept user input correctly, and submit button triggers proper API communication upon activation.

user_persona: A researcher preparing visual documentation for stakeholders.
user_goal: To manipulate and export chart visuals for inclusion in presentations.

narrative_steps.title: Activating Zoom Tool
narrative_steps.description: Nina wants to zoom into a specific fluctuation pattern shown in the chart to make precise observations.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Zoom In' tool beneath the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chart allows zooming into selected regions, enhancing readability of small variations.

narrative_steps.title: Exporting Chart as Image
narrative_steps.description: Having finalized the view, Nina exports the chart image for her presentation slides.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Export PNG' option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A downloadable PNG file of the current chart view is generated and ready for download.

requirement_tested: Enable users to view solar generation trends over time
user_persona: A homeowner comparing seasonal solar production changes.
user_goal: To observe how solar generation varied throughout the previous quarter.

narrative_steps.title: Requesting Quarterly Solar Trends
narrative_steps.description: Emily sets the date range to span the last three months and queries historical data focused on solar generation.
narrative_steps.action: Select quarterly date range and submit query.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A line chart loads showing solar generation fluctuations over the selected period, with axis labels reflecting timestamps and kW values.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Specific Data Points
narrative_steps.description: Emily hovers over certain peaks and dips to understand contributing factors behind those readings.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over individual data points on the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip overlays provide precise datetime stamps and corresponding kW outputs for hovered data points.

requirement_tested: Allow filtering and date range selection for historical data
user_persona: A utility auditor cross-verifying reported energy figures.
user_goal: To isolate specific types of historical data over custom periods.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Filter Criteria
narrative_steps.description: Marcus specifies both a narrow date window and enables only the 'Solar Generation' filter to focus his review.
narrative_steps.action: Choose date range and enable 'Solar Generation' filter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected dates and active filters update internally and prepare accurate data subset for retrieval.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Customized Query
narrative_steps.description: With settings confirmed, Marcus submits the refined query to pull targeted historical data.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Fetch Historical Data' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only solar generation records falling within the chosen timeframe are returned and presented.

user_persona: A site supervisor overseeing continuous operations remotely.
user_goal: To keep real-time data updated automatically but have control over frequency.

narrative_steps.title: Disabling Auto Refresh Temporarily
narrative_steps.description: While troubleshooting an anomaly, Olivia disables auto-refresh to stabilize the numbers on screen.
narrative_steps.action: Toggle the auto-refresh switch off.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Automatic data fetching stops; values remain static until manually refreshed or re-enabled.

narrative_steps.title: Resuming Auto Updates
narrative_steps.description: Once satisfied with adjustments, Olivia turns auto-refresh back on to resume normal operation.
narrative_steps.action: Toggle the auto-refresh switch back on.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard resumes periodic updates every 30 seconds by default, pulling live data continuously.

requirement_tested: Include navigation between real-time and historical views
user_persona: A casual user switching contexts frequently during a session.
user_goal: To seamlessly alternate between viewing live stats and historical trends.

narrative_steps.title: Switching to Historical View
narrative_steps.description: After checking current conditions, Ben clicks on the 'Historical View' tab to dive deeper into past performances.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Historical View' tab header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content area transitions smoothly to reveal the historical query form and chart sections.

narrative_steps.title: Returning to Real-Time View
narrative_steps.description: Having reviewed historical data, Ben switches back to see ongoing metrics again.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Real-Time View' tab header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard content shifts back to show real-time cards and active metrics panels instantly.
